text: "Pose" is a song by American rapper Yo Gotti featuring American rapper Lil Uzi Vert. Epic Records released it on August 23, 2019. ==Background and composition== The release of "Pose" was confirmed in an Epic Records press release. Yo Gotti announced the song via Instagram hours before its release, along with a snippet and artwork. "Pose" has heavy bass, with Gotti rapping about first-world problems which he faces because of his success and wealth. The song makes use of the sound of a camera shutter. Gotti describes a love- hate relationship through the lyrics, making use of metaphors about posing for pictures. The official remix features an additional verse by Megan Thee Stallion. ==Critical reception== David Renshaw of The Fader described "Pose" as a "snap-happy" track, adding that Vert was in a "more confident place" than Gotti. HipHopDXs Chris Patrick called the song a "high caliber single", and stated that it "proves Gotti isn't playing around this year and could be the closest we get to hearing Uzi's Eternal Atake for a while. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row"| Various | August 23, 2019 | | rowspan="2"| Epic | |- ! scope="row"| United States | September 10, 2019 | Rhythmic contemporary | |} ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Epic Records singles Category:Yo Gotti songs Category:Lil Uzi Vert songs Category:Songs written by Benjamin Diehl Category:Songs written by Yo Gotti Category:Songs written by Lil Uzi Vert
